question: The Central Government has announced a scheme to completely solarise which famous temple?
explanation:
Union Government has recently launched a scheme for complete solarization of Konark Sun Temple and Konark town in Odisha. It will be implemented by the Odisha Renewable Energy Development Agency. The project outlay of Rs. 25 crore will be provided by the Centre.
As per the Ministry of New and Renewable Energy, the scheme aims to set up 10 Mega Watt grid connected solar project and solar applications like solar trees and solar drinking water kiosks, to implement the scheme.
